It would look like

orb -> Void staff -> orb -> Morello

instead of

orb -> Blasting wand/amp -> Void staff -> morello

??? It's not tho. It's vastly more efficient. Void Staff essentially makes all flat penetration 40% more effective.

100 MR target vs 15 flat pen and 40% pen.

15/100 = 15% resists negated
15/(100 - 40%) = 25% resists negated (by flat pen)

15% -> 25% is a 40% increase in flat penetration's effectiveness here.
